name: Edge of Reality Visual Novel
description:
It seems that there can be no more boring profession in the world than an appraiser in a pawnshop. But meeting with a mysterious young lady and a series of strange events, change the idea of den about his craft. In this game You have to plunge into the story, where dream and reality are intertwined into a single whole. Where, at some point, reality itself may lose its stability.

Feature of game:
- Non-linear passage, and unexpected plot twists;
- Unique visual style;
- Music written specifically for this game, allows you to fully convey the atmosphere;
